definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: Simulations have been made to validate the good separation performance of the algor…
sentences.chinese: 仿真驗證對聲音等非平穩信號具有良好的分離效果。

sentences.english: And then it stabilized and has remained at this level.
sentences.chinese: 然後趨於平穩，並一直維持在這一水平上。

sentences.english: That means, says Cheong, that the "succession has reached a stable trajectory."
sentences.chinese: 鄭說，這意味着“繼任工作已經進入平穩軌道。”

sentences.english: The stationary conditions and autocorrelation function of the MARMA process are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 討論了MARMA模型的平穩性條件和自相關函數。

sentences.english: Hoister running smooth, it can be upgraded to reach a higher height.
sentences.chinese: 提升機運行平穩，因此可達到較高的提升高度。

sentences.english: We study the unstable autoregressive process for the first order with infinite variance.
sentences.chinese: 對具有無限方差的一階自迴歸非平穩過程進行了研究。

sentences.english: The system is running smoothly with large through-put volume, easy to operate.
sentences.chinese: 人員通過量高，機械運轉平穩。

sentences.english: This is the summary of the first 7 years. It's very steady over time.
sentences.chinese: 這是頭7年的總結，數據顯示很平穩。

sentences.english: Air increases times machine air flow generated than ordinary fan.
sentences.chinese: 空氣增倍機的空氣流動比普通風扇產生的風更平穩。

sentences.english: Maintaining price stability is also a central concern of policy.
sentences.chinese: 維持物價平穩也是政策關注的中心。

sentences.english: Burn candles on a flat, stable, heat-resistant surface.
sentences.chinese: 將蠟燭放在平穩及耐熱的平面上燃點。

sentences.english: Right now that target price has a modest but steady economic recovery as a major assumption.
sentences.chinese: 此刻這個目標價位如同總體想定一樣，適度而平穩。

sentences.english: Experimentation result indicates that the arithmetic satisfied required control precision and placidity.
sentences.chinese: 試驗結果表明，算法滿足控制精度和平穩性的要求。

sentences.english: Harmonic wavelet analysis can extract the singular components in the non-stationary signal effectively.
sentences.chinese: 諧波小波分析可有效提取非平穩信號中的奇異成分。

sentences.english: Single-belt transportation, placidly and quickly , small friction, little waste.
sentences.chinese: 雙皮帶運膜，快速平穩，摩擦小，損耗少。

sentences.english: You will reach a brand new plateau that has enormous potential.
sentences.chinese: 你將達到一個的新的擁有大量潛力的平穩發展期。

definition: whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
variant of 復甦|复苏[fu4 su1]/to recover (health, economic)/to resuscitate/anabiosis
to slow/to slow down (the pace of)
